text: Twarabarenganije bene Israeri mukiyaga bari kumwe na Fir’auni hamwe n’ingabo ziwe baca babakurikira n’ubuhemu bw’imitima yabo hamwe n’ubwishime kugeza naho Fir’auni yibizwa mumazi nuguca avuga ati:- ndemeye yuko atayindi Mana y’ukuri itegerezwa gusegwa bimwe vy’ukuri atari irya bemera bene Israeri, nanje ndi mubagamburutsi b’Imana y’ukuri
